items.sentence: You have a very impressive operation here, Tom.
I\'d go to Boston again if I had the chance to.
I\'m sure Tom will think we shouldn\'t do that.
My professor didn\'t have tenure and was fired.
Tom is going to be working in Boston on Monday.
You haven\'t heard a word I\'ve said, have you?
I\'m going to the supermarket to get some milk.
Tom held his breath till he got to the surface.
Tom left thirty minutes before the party ended.
Would you like to grab a bite to eat somewhere?
